Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: A young prince sets out to rescue his kingdom from an evil sorcerer.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince trusts the advice of a friendly forest spirit and follows it.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince encounters a group of bandits and fights them.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to continue on without accepting a powerful weapon from a mysterious stranger.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince meets a group of rebels who are fighting against the sorcerer's rule.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to join the rebels and help them in their fight.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince comes across a mysterious cave and decides to investigate its secrets.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to continue on his own and not get involved in the rebels' cause.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince meets a wise old man who helps him on his quest.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince comes across a magical portal that transports him to a different realm.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to explore the new realm and see what he can learn.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince encounters a group of trolls and decides to negotiate a peaceful resolution.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince meets a group of mermaids who offer to help him find a rare and powerful magical artifact.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to return to the portal and continue on his journey.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince encounters a powerful dragon that guards a treasure he needs to complete his quest.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to try and defeat the dragon and take the treasure.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince defeats the dragon and collects his treasure

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to find another way to obtain the treasure without fighting the dragon.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince decides to try and sneak past the dragon and obtain the treasure without fighting it.

Narrative.title: Game Branch
Narrative.description: The prince aquires the treasure and leaves quietly

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince comes across a group of fairies who offer to help him on his quest.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince faces challenges and battles as he journeys to the sorcerer's castle.

Narrative.title: Game Narrative
Narrative.description: The prince defeats the sorcerer and saves the kingdom.
